name: Super Stick Fight Man
description:
Are you ready to experience fighting?Do you wonder to become a hero?Now choose your skills and equipments and join the epic battle quickly.Start fighting to survive yourself and improve your rank!

Adventure of Hero is a fun mix with the best of battle and the adventure game. shooting your enemies and survive in this Rougelike battle game!

Game Features:
-Multiple weapon and armor options to create the perfect equipment
-Destroy your enemies with delightfully intuitive controls
-Challenge multiple levels to win more coins
-Collect pieces for special equipment

Official feedback email: support@peakxgames.com
